html:
Feb 11 (Reuters) - SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC SCHN.PA

  • FY REVENUE EUR 25.16 BILLION VERSUS EUR 27.16 BILLION YEAR AGO

  • FY ADJUSTED EBITA EUR 3.93 BILLION VERSUS EUR 4.24 BILLION YEAR AGO

  • FY ADJUSTED EBITA MARGIN STABLE AT 15.6%

  • END-FY FREE CASH FLOW EUR 3.67 BILLION VERSUS EUR 3.48 BILLION YEAR AGO

  • FY NET INCOME GROUP SHARE EUR 2.13 BILLION VERSUS EUR 2.41 BILLION YEAR AGO

  • OUTLOOK 2021: ADJUSTED EBITA GROWTH BETWEEN +9% AND +15% ORGANIC

  • OUTLOOK 2021: REVENUE GROWTH OF +5% TO +8% ORGANIC, ADJUSTED EBITA MARGIN OF AROUND 16.1% TO 16.5%

  • SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC - REITERATES ACROSS CYCLE GROWTH AND MEDIUM-TERM MARGIN AMBITION

  • SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC - SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAM REMAINS ON-HOLD IN NEAR TERM, DUE TO ECONOMIC UNCERTAINTY AND OSISOFT TRANSACTION

  • NET DEBT EUR 3.56 BILLION AT 31 DEC. 2020 (EUR 3.79 BILLION IN DEC. 2019)

  • PROPOSED DIVIDEND IS EUR 2.60 PER SHARE, UP 2.0% VERSUS 2019

  • FOCUS NOW ON INTEGRATION AND SYNERGIES ; DISPOSAL PROGRAM ONGOING, AS PER PLAN

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: SCHN.PA


(Gdansk Newsroom)
